Sentencas: We demonstrate a new architecture for a low temperature solid oxide fuel cell to enlarge the lateral dimension of the fragile nano thin film electrolyte from the micrometer to millimeter scale with greatly enhanced mechanical stability.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability

Sentencas: The new structure was achieved by simple silicon micromachining processes to change the membrane shape from a square to a circle to reduce buckling-induced stress concentration that often caused membrane fracture.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability

Sentencas: A tapered silicon membrane support with the thickest end of 30 mm was introduced as an effective membrane stress absorber.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability

Sentencas: The new architecture effectively suppressed membrane buckling and decreased the maximum principal stress by 30-40%.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability

Sentencas: The largest lateral dimension of the stable membranes was 3 mm in diameter, and the survival rate was significantly improved over square membranes having the same lateral dimension.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability

Sentencas: Fuel cells with 100 nm-thick electrolytes showed stable open circuit voltages of 1.12 V at 400 degrees C for more than 8 hours without any membrane failure observed, showing the superior mechanical stability of the new cell architecture that is promising in the further practical applications of such devices.
Titulo: A circular membrane for nano thin film micro solid oxide fuel cells with enhanced mechanical stability
